flavourText: There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Belly of the Beast

flavourText: A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Perandus Blazon

flavourText: Knowledge brings power, and with power you can
grab truth by the throat and shape it as you wish.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Supreme Truth

flavourText: "Shoot first, ask no questions."
- Karui wisdom
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Karui Ward
<<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Soul Arrow
explicitMods: Adds 6 to 9 Physical Damage to Attacks
implicitMods: Adds 6 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks with Bows

secDescrText: Damage enemies around you, then perform a spinning series of attacks as you travel to a target location.
descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: A mighty bulwark, curved and strong
A dauntless wall, against the throng
All lance and arrow, knocked aside
For rout of foe, for turn of tide.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Titucius' Span
explicitMods: -10 Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks

flavourText: A swift mind solves problems before they occur.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Saffell's Frame
explicitMods: 75% of Block Chance applied to Spells

flavourText: My bearer shall be guarded by flame,
for I am the phoenix, forever radiant in glory.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Rise of the Phoenix
explicitMods: +25% to Fire Resistance while on Low Life
10% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Ignited while on Low Life

flavourText: Every decade, Lunaris devours Solaris
Each time, Solaris emerges from Lunaris, born anew.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Eclipse Solaris
explicitMods: 120% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies

flavourText: There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Belly of the Beast

secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them easier to pierce and to knock back, and increasing the damage they take from projectiles.
descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Projectiles have an additional 50% chance to Pierce Cursed enemies
Hits on Cursed Enemies have an additional 25% chance to Knockback
Cursed enemies take 33% increased Damage from Projectiles

flavourText: "She begged the Earth to spare her Son;
Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Immortal Flesh
explicitMods: 40% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Entropy Blood
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
explicitMods: 6% increased Attack Speed with One Handed Melee Weapons

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Cataclysm Ruin
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
explicitMods: 14% increased Melee Physical Damage while holding a Shield

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Damnation Glimmer
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
explicitMods: +11% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Two Handed Melee Weapons

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Empyrean Spark
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
explicitMods: 5% increased Attack Speed with Two Handed Melee Weapons

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Chimeric Dew
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

flavourText: A tap on the shoulder
A peck on the cheek
A sip of your wine
So red and so sleek
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Goredrill
explicitMods: 40% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies

flavourText: The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Queen's Decree

flavourText: Sure, there's many a hard man out there.
But this'll soften them up.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Gorebreaker

flavourText: The sun's fury, trapped
in pillars of blazing light,
Explodes from its cage.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Sunblast
explicitMods: Traps Trigger at the end of their Duration

flavourText: It is said to make you invisible when the Great
Spirit comes to take you on your final journey.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Araku Tiki
explicitMods: You gain 100 Evasion Rating when on Low Life
1% of Life Regenerated per second while on Low Life

flavourText: Doomed to plunder forever.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wheel of the Stormsail
explicitMods: 100% increased Duration of Curses on you

flavourText: Nothing is pure.
Slice open the Innocent
And spill a thousand Sins.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Mark of the Doubting Knight
explicitMods: 5% additional Block Chance while Dual Wielding
Melee Critical Strikes have 25% chance to cause Bleeding
Melee Critical Strikes have 25% chance to Poison the Enemy

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Maelström Fingers
explicitMods: +2 Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Behemoth Glimmer
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
explicitMods: 3% increased Cast Speed while holding a Shield

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Miracle Weaver
explicitMods: 94% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

flavourText: Absolute corruption empowers absolutely.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Voidbringer
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Elemental Gems
136% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

flavourText: Doomed to plunder forever.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wheel of the Stormsail
explicitMods: 100% increased Duration of Curses on you

flavourText: Life persisted,
hardened, twisted.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Twyzel
explicitMods: Socketed Gems fire an additional Projectile

flavourText: Bargg Wurmkin once severed the heads
of seven men in a single cleave.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wideswing
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 20 Increased Area of Effect

flavourText: When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Cloak of Defiance

flavourText: "A raging Solaris seared and contorted the orb's surface.
A despairing Lunaris filled the scars with her tears.
Yet Viridi remained, trapped within, forever more."
- Azmerian Creation Myth
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Prismatic Eclipse
explicitMods: 8% additional Block Chance while Dual Wielding
25% increased Physical Damage with Weapons per Red Socket
12% increased Global Attack Speed per Green Socket
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Blue Socket
+2 to Melee Weapon Range per White Socket

flavourText: "...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Carcass Jack

flavourText: "See without doubt, slay without hesitation."
- Marceus Lioneye of Sarn
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lioneye's Glare

flavourText: The whispers of the dead
Carry wisdom for the living,
If you are willing to give your life
To listen.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dying Breath
explicitMods: Nearby Enemies have 18% increased Effect of Curses on them
18% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras you Cast

flavourText: Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Meginord's Vise

flavourText: For none of us are as cruel as all of us.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Leer Cast
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 15% increased Damage

flavourText: Life persisted,
hardened, twisted.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Twyzel
explicitMods: Socketed Gems fire an additional Projectile

flavourText: Every rule has an exception.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Broken Crown
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are supported by level 20 Cast on Death
20% increased Damage when on Low Life

flavourText: In battle, virtue matters not.
Only victory.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Belt of the Deceiver
explicitMods: 10% reduced Chance to Block Attacks and Spells
You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

flavourText: "It takes true strength to hold power,
and my grip grows tighter by the day."
- Emperor Chitus
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Chitus' Apex

flavourText: Touch not the thorn, for only blood and pain await.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Blood Thorn
explicitMods: Reflects 22 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block
Curse Enemies with level 5 Vulnerability on Block

flavourText: So the seed of hate was born,
Evil forged and Hope forsworn.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Doomsower
explicitMods: Socketed Melee Gems have 15% increased Area of Effect Radius
Socketed Red Gems get 10% Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

flavourText: Wonders abound at death's door.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wondertrap
explicitMods: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life

flavourText: "Toasted or frozen
Or twitching in the light
I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Doomfletch
explicitMods: Gain 110% of Bow Physical Damage as Extra Damage of an Element

flavourText: Forged to rule the waves and tide
Destined to serve the monkey's paw
Strong as a tower of iron
Deft as the needle doubt
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Pillar of the Caged God
explicitMods: 1% increased Area of Effect Radius per 20 Intelligence
16% increased Physical Weapon Damage per 10 Strength

flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Sadima's Touch
explicitMods: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Mind Hunger
explicitMods: 104% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

flavourText: The wolf greeted the king,
In the light of the harvest moon.
The wolf offered the strength of the wild,
And the king paid for it in blood.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Vortex Scarab

craftedMods: 60% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dusk Etcher
explicitMods: Adds 43 to 85 Fire Damage to Spells

flavourText: "A lick of shadow may ease
the petty frictions of one's life."
- Inquisitor Maligaro
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dusktoe
explicitMods: +50% to Chaos Resistance while using a Flask

flavourText: The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Death's Harp
<<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Bramble Wreck
explicitMods: 0.32% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

flavourText: It is too easy for the soul to escape from an open heart.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Soul Taker
explicitMods: Insufficient Mana doesn't prevent your Melee Attacks

flavourText: A soft caress in dead of night,
that slips about the neck, so tight.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Slitherpinch
explicitMods: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

flavourText: Forget your kite shield. Just put the biggest man
in the field between you and the archers.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Bronn's Lithe

implicitMods: +25 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

flavourText: <size:26>{At the beck and call
of The Siren's hand,
winter ravages
the trembling land,
and the weight of ice that binds
will break the strongest of minds.}
Desperate times demand desperate measures.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Last Resort
explicitMods: 25% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
100% increased Claw Physical Damage when on Low Life
100% increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life
implicitMods: +3 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

flavourText: Fairgraves' trusty tricorne accompanied him far across
the seas, deep under the ground, and even beyond death.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Fairgraves' Tricorne
explicitMods: Adds 6 to 12 Cold Damage to Attacks

flavourText: . . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lightbane Raiment

flavourText: Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

flavourText: The First Ones thundered over Ezomyr
upon hooves of grey and black.
The people felt their stamping rage
and cowered as the fury rained down.
- The Wolven King
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Golem Noose

long after they have been made

Hissing arrows from the dark.

Licks the skin and flesh from the fearful
Where there is no fear
There is no flame

the greater the beast that hunts it.

All was woe that seem'd but gladness.

- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Kaltenhalt

flavourText: The strong grow stronger still.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Mantra of Flames

flavourText: When the storm comes,
the safest place to be is the centre.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Stormheart
explicitMods: You cannot be Shocked while Frozen

flavourText: "Should I depart this mortal coil,
so shall all of my treasures."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Vaults of Atziri
descrText: Travel to this Map by using it in the Eternal Laboratory or a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.

typeLine: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Honed Avian Twins Talisman of the Tempest
flavourText: The first ones live where they can, where they must.
They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.
Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,
living with time and happenstance, as must we.
- The Wolven King
explicitMods: Adds 5 to 10 Physical Damage to Attacks
implicitMods: 50% of Lightning Damage taken as Cold Damage

flavourText: The civilised man must wrestle
with the demands of heart and mind.
The First Ones share no such struggle.
For their Spirit is swift and deadly certain.
- The Wolven King
The First Ones stalk with us
upon this lifelong hunt,
and cast their contempt
upon those that would make us their prey.
- The Wolven King
For too long we have crawled in darkness,
scavenging through rotten scraps.
The First Ones teach us to scavenge until we can hunt,
and then never crawl again.
- The Wolven King
The Empire hides lies and falsehoods
Behind a mask of politeness and civility.
The First Ones teach us to look through the lies,
And that no beast can truly cover their tracks.
- The Wolven King
explicitMods: Adds 6 to 14 Cold Damage to Attacks

flavourText: The roar of the heavens
Strikes more than fear
Into the hearts of Man
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Thunderfist
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 18 Added Lightning Damage
Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks

flavourText: "There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lightning Coil
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 27 Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% of Physical Damage taken as Lightning Damage

secDescrText: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is released from the weapon as projectiles as you strike, flying out behind your target to hit farther-away enemies. The projectiles cannot miss if the melee attack hit its target.
descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage

flavourText: "I know how to say 'faster' and 'attack'
in Karui, Marak and Ezo."
- Voll of Thebrus
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Brightbeak

secDescrText: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to you, in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.
descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: That which was broken may yet break.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Sire of Shards
explicitMods: Socketed Gems fire Projectiles in a Nova

name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Rage Caress
explicitMods: 0.25% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

flavourText: "There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.
name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Lightning Coil
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 21 Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% of Physical Damage taken as Lightning Damage
